name: Spark Five
description: Welcome to Project Spark. Help our little android friend navigate across multiple, challenging levels in search of bio-matter. You see, we are in desperate need of those primarily to restore human civilization and undo the damage caused by our own problem child - Artificial Intelligence.
minimum_requirements: OS: Version 7 Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 2 GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 290 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Version 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 4 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 290 MB available space
